result.eng: The meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
result.ga: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asam
result.orig: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asam
result.html: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asamThe meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
result.ponchtml: Ṡúiġ an cruinniú an fuinneaṁ ar fad asamThe meeting sucked all my energy out of me.

result.eng: There is strength and energy in me.
result.html: Tá neart agus fuinneamh ionamThere is strength and energy in me.
result.ponchtml: Tá neart agus fuinneaṁ ionamThere is strength and energy in me.
